long_description: Fry some eggs and flip a few pancakes with the Coleman Triton(TM) Griddle. The Coleman Triton Griddle provides ample space for family-sized meals. Durable die-cast aluminum has a nonstick finish that's a breeze to clean. Compatible with the Coleman PerfectFlow(TM) 2-burner camp stove and the PerfectFlow InstaStart(TM) 2-burner propane camp stove (sold separately).
short_description: Fry some eggs and flip a few pancakes with the Coleman Triton(TM) Griddle.
